content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Simple problem that could be fun to solve in CoC

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: I like this idea. It would be pretty fun to solve

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: It would be fun to play in all of the categories
Simple and smart! Enjoyed solving it!

Goal section
* While explaining using an example is good, you should still describe your requirement before giving that example.
* (1+2+...+7) does not equal to 28^2. Please add "^2" after the right bracket.

Input section
* N does not represent the first set of "numers". Please rewrite the description. (While the typo is an issue, the bigger issue is that N is a number, not a set of numbers.)

Output section
* You cannot recycle N here: if N is the input variable, N cannot be the output variable at the same time (at least in the clash statement). Just remove it.

Stub generator
* Please add a write statement.

Thanks.
